text: The 1992 season of the Torneo Descentralizado was the 77th season of the top category of Peruvian football (soccer). It was played by 16 teams. The national champions were Universitario. ==Teams== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Team ! City ! Stadium ! Capacity !
